holidays.title: Squirrel Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Squirrel Appreciation Day on January 21 is when we show appreciation for the world's cutest rodents.

holidays.title: Day of Sanctity and Protection of Human Life
holidays.description: Today reflects on how precious life is — no matter how short it is.

holidays.title: Grandma Day
holidays.description: We have all the reasons why you should show your grandmother appreciation today!

holidays.title: International Playdate Day
holidays.description: Arrange a playdate for your kids so they can enjoy a fun-filled afternoon.

holidays.title: International Sweatpants Day
holidays.description: Have fun and rock your favorite baggy sweatpants this International Sweatpants Day.

holidays.title: Mariachi Day
holidays.description: Pound your feet on the dance floor as we groove to the beat of mariachi.

holidays.title: National Bakers-Crafters-Makers Day
holidays.description: Today is a great day to spend money on handmade products — support these talented creators.

holidays.title: National Cheesy Socks Day
holidays.description: Get ready to sport your favorite cheesy socks. Let the world admire you!

holidays.title: National Conscious Uncoupling Day
holidays.description: Let’s promote amicable separation through conscious uncoupling to prevent families from being broken by divorce.

holidays.title: National Granola Bar Day
holidays.description: Now is the time to put your granola-making skills to the test.

holidays.title: National Hug Your Puppy Day
holidays.description: It’s National Hug Your Puppy Day — pick up your puppy and give him/her a hug!

holidays.title: National Max Day
holidays.description: Live your life to the fullest! What if your first and last name are both Max?

holidays.title: One-Liners Day
holidays.description: You don’t have to be a comedian or even witty to enjoy One-Liners Day.

holidays.title: Our Lady of Altagracia
holidays.description: Here's all you need to know about the Our Lady of Altagracia holiday.

holidays.title: Own Your Own Home Day
holidays.description: Owning a home is not exactly easy, so why not celebrate your homeownership status.

holidays.title: Thank Your Mentor Day
holidays.description: Pssst! Remember, you can always thank your mentor by giving him or her a surprise!

holidays.title: World Religion Day
holidays.description: Our differences make us stronger, so join us in celebrating our different beliefs and cultures.

holidays.title: World Snow Day
holidays.description: ‘Enjoy, experience and explore’ —  the motto of World Snow Day, which we’re taking seriously indeed.

holidays.title: Aleksa Safiya’s Birthday
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate a lady with a sweet voice and bold aspirations.

holidays.title: Freddie Tomlinson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Freddie Tomlinson is growing steadily in the shadow of his father’s fame.

holidays.title: Sushant Singh Rajput’s Birthday
holidays.description: Sushant Singh Rajput is remembered for his extraordinary talent and desire for excellence.

holidays.title: Thomas Stonewall Jackson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Thomas Stonewall Jackson was a superb battle tactician with even ampler commitment.
